leaflet.candidateName: Jasper Gerard and Cllr Cynthia Robertson

messages.title: Working for Maidstone
messages.content: Jasper Gerard has been fighting hard for residents in Maidstone & the Weald for the past two years.

messages.title: A record of delivery for Allington ward
messages.content: Jasper Gerward, Team Leader - Your Opportunity for Better

messages.title: Fighting Congestion
messages.content: Cynthia has been battling against congestion that is plaguing Maidstone's roads.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jasper has been fighting Conservative house building plans that would see thousands of houses built without extra infrastructure.
Plans for road projects such as 'tailgates' to ease the congestion issues.

housing.content: Conservative house building plans that would see thousands of houses built without extra infrastructure.

images.caption: Jasper has been helping residents from his office in Bluett Street.
Jasper Gerard and Cllr Cynthia Robertson in front of a building.
Cynthia with two other individuals, captioned 'Fighting Congestion'.
